A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This film was an amazingly rich and rewarding addition to the Star Wars saga. If you really put yourself in Rian Johnsons (the writer/director) shoes - with the story he was given - its easy to see that he executed the film in the most fulfilling\, logical\, yet unexpected way possible. 

SPOILERS: 

Lukes character arch was perfect. He learned what it really meant to be a master before dying on the island - as he said he would. Luke looking out onto the two suns - like he did in A New Hope - just before he passes\, was very powerful. So many fantastic scenes in this film. The ones between Rey and Kylo were spectacular. 
I loved this film!
